content: The glacially fed Slims River, in the Yukon, is now extinct as of spring, 2016. It was flowing into Kluane Lake, but is now reduced as the Kaskawulsh Glacier melted, with remaining water going into Kaskawulsh River and further on into the Gulf of Alaska__no.0111, 2017.  #Glaciers #Glaciermelt #Climatechange
